title: Oat and Flaxseed Bread
ingredients: ['350ml (12 fl oz) water', '2 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '3 tablespoons honey', '150g (5 oz) Ready brek', '175g (6 oz) wholemeal flour', '175g (6 oz) bread flour', '75g (3 oz) flaxseed meal', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
